query:
SELECT
            exercise.id,
            exercise.name,
            'correct' = ANY(user_solution.status) AS solved
        FROM exercise
        LEFT OUTER JOIN (
            SELECT
                exercise_id,
                ARRAY_AGG(status) AS status
            FROM user_solution
            WHERE
                user_id = $1
            GROUP BY exercise_id
        ) AS user_solution ON exercise.id = user_solution.exercise_id
        ORDER BY exercise.id
